thread.title: Obama apologizes to aid group for US attack on Afghan clinic
thread.title_full: Obama apologizes to aid group for US attack on Afghan clinic

author: IronFist
title: Obama apologizes to aid group for US attack on Afghan clinic
text: Obama apologizes to aid group for US attack on Afghan clinic Looks like Obama just doesn't understand what he is even doing. Sure thing those apologizes he gave will help all those Afghanis who died during the attack. I can't even get it. We have the best weapons in the world which are extremely precise but we still missed. Maybe Obama destroyed the hospital because he actually wanted to do that? At least Obama could give some money to the Afghani government if he really feels sorry about the things he did. Very likely there was hostile fire coming from the hospital compound...and the compound could have been hard to identify....This is a favorite tactic of the bad guys using innocent civilians as political pawn disgusting habit of theirs....
